size Property

CDXML Name:size
Data Size:CDXCoordinate
Property of objects:s
First written/read in:ChemDraw 4.0
Required?No

Description:

The size of a font.

This property is used only in CDXML files. In CDX files, font information is stored as part of the Font Style data type.

If this property is absent:

The size will be treated as having a value of zero. This will very likely produce undesired results.
